Description: Job Purpose: Job Duties: - Perform structural analysis and design for mostly but not limited to horizontal elements, including precast/ prestressed/ post tension/ RC slabs and beams.- Carry out cost comparisons and value engineering to choose the most effective type of structural system to price or execute.- Deliver design solutions and drawings to high quality standards in a timely manner to meet project schedules.- Coordinate site activities with factory and clientSkills
Skills: - 2 years experience minimum in reinforced concrete design
- Software knowledge: Etabs or robot, safe, AutoCAD 2d.
- Ability to calculate all structural elements by hand.
- Knowledge of the following codes: ACI 318, IBC / UBC
The following are not required but are a plus if they are already acquired before training:
- Knowledge of the PCI 7th edition, PTI 6th edition or other prestressed codes.
- Adapt, RAM or other prestressed software knowledge.
